aboutme: I am Computer Science Graduate(2016-2020 batch) from Malaviya National Institute of Technology(MNIT, Jaipur), India. Currently I am working as Full Stack Developer for Oracle Financial Services Software(OFSS), India.

I am a Fast learner and Strong Analytical thinker with problem solving skills. I have handled multiple tasks under pressure by help of my organized way of working. The good thing - which my team members always appreciate for :),  is my perfection in task finishing and development which is very less pron to errors. I have worked on many technologies including Microservices with SpringBoot, Flexible RESTful APIs, DevOps, Natural Language Processing, Deep Learning etc.

workexp: Working on DevOps: Maintaining the job scheduling service provided to applications in different flavors on Docker and Kubernetes.

Stable Developmnet(Backend and Frontend): Dealing with job scheduling service for different applications at the same time, ensuring product's stability. Reduced tech-debt by resolving a high number of bugs and providing useful enhancements within existing service.

UI Developemnt: Designed a few rich User Interfaces using OJET and refined the existing UI's to more rich and user friendly. The major difficulty was to make these UI faster and robust, which I successfully accompolished in very less span of time.
NLP: Developed a user-friendly multi-label text classification web application using NLP concepts and Oracle JavaScript Extension Toolkit(OJET).
Worked on Image preprocessing and Computer Vision for Real time Person identification and action recognition.
Developed an Python GUI based attendence system by using conventional image processing methods for face detection and recognition.
Worked on different time series forecasting methods(ARIMA, SARIMA, Prophet etc.) for sales forecasting.

projects.subtitle: Static Web UI
projects.description: Basic portfolio UI which is a reusable template based web app, and can be reused just by changing the template and adding the required images.

projects.subtitle: Static Web UI
projects.description: A server-based recognition engine in which I implemented speech to text functionality using SpeechRecognition API in javascript.

projects.subtitle: Deep Learning Project
projects.description: A deep learning-based project which aims to detect drowsiness of the driver at early stages. I proposed a CNN-LSTM architecture for this and worked on RLDD dataset.

projects.subtitle: Computer Vision + Desktop Application
projects.description: A real time attendance system based on the face detection and identification using Digital Image Processing and Database concepts.

projects.subtitle: Desktop Application
projects.description: Movie House is a desktop application (Developed using JavaFX) on which user can purchase movies and watch them after buying.

projects.subtitle: Web Application
projects.description: Developed a web application for online training & placement management system for a college which can reduce most of the manual work of T&P cell of a college.
